content: For all here that are new to FHIR (but love to use C#), we are running a series of C# tutorials during the upcoming DevDays in Boston: https://www.fhirdevdays.com/boston/schedule/#rdv-calendar. We will also cover the use of the Validator and FHIRPath engine there!
Sir, please make it possible to have videos of FHIR dev days or live streaming. So that adaptation of FHIR would be easy for the people from other countries who cannot reach there physically.

For those just starting out with the libraries, the first tutorial to start with will be my talk about the FHIR .NET API on Tuesday morning. I will demonstrate how to use the FHIR model and FhirClient, by creating a simple client application. After that, I will be around to help you do the same at the hands-on track, so you will be ready for Ewouts more advanced topics in the afternoon. Hope to see you in Boston!
